creditline: Gift of The Saul Steinberg Foundation
image_copyright: © The Saul Steinberg Foundation / Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York
medium: Marker, colored pencil, crayon, and pastel on cut brown paper bag
provenance: The artist, New York; Saul Steinberg Foundation, New York; given to MIA, 2018
text: Walk like an Egyptian! Steinberg relished child-like play. He made many masks from brown paper bags. This one seems familiar from Egyptian mummy cases (sarcophagi). It features a stylized version of the makeup and hairstyle worn by aristocratic women during the 21st dynasty (1077-943 BCE).
title: Untitled (Mask)
